name: Wrap Up
description:
You help out at Santa's workshop by delegating duties to hard working elves. Christmas Season is always busy so wrap it all up on time :D

Use the Left Mouse Button to play. Click on Elf, click on toy, follow the to do list--rinse and repeat. 

In main menu-Press Esc to quit.

in Game Press-Esc to Pause (and see goals) and press it again to quit.
